info.name: CBC Dark Night Mode
info.description: A dark style for CBC websites. Applies to News, Sports, Radio, Music, Listen sections.
info.additionalInfo:
2019-12-14: Version 1.4
- fixed new Recommended for you list
- tweaked primary heading style
- tweaked Load More buttons

2019-09-26: Version 1.3
- fixed new primary heading style
- tweaked some underlines

2019-09-06: Version 1.2
- fixed dark text and arrow overlay on teaser cards broken by CBC changes

2019-07-05: Version 1.1
- added styles for Music and Listen sections 
- added styles for Comments area

2019-06-20: Version 1.0
- Initial launch
- Includes News, Radio and Sports sections
